name: Squares Are Not Real
description:
Game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Help your little brother Triangle face the squares that attack him every night. Give him powerups in the form of advice during the Visual Novel section, and then control him in the fight in a top-down shooter!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Space - Dash
LMB - Shoot
M.Wheel - Zoom In/Out
F - Bullet time
R - Reload
N - Reset

Game Design and Art: Daniel Chernov
Narrative: Luciano Salerno
Music: Bajo Consumo (Gonzalo Guerra)
